data.title: Trattoria Trecolori in Midtown Manhattan
data.meta_description: Welcome to Trattoria Trecolori’s website.  We are celebrating over 25 years serving excellent Italian meals in the Theatre District.  Our friends and regular patrons have been telling us that we are the best and most authentic New York-Italian restaurant in Midtown!  We are very proud to hear this and that is what makes us happy to open our doors every day.  To continue our tradition of great food and excellent service!
data.meta_site_name: Trattoria Trecolori - Family owned Italian Restaurant in the Theatre District, Midtown Manhattan
data.text:
Penne Arrabiata

Plum tomatoes, basil, roasted garlic, and spicy red pepper.

$22

Fettuccine Alfredo

Home-made Fettuccine in parmigiano-cream sauce

$23

Add grilled Mushrooms $6

Add Chiken $7

Add Shrimp $9

Spaghetti Alla Carbonara

Pancetta, fresh herbs and onion 'in brood' with a touch of cream

$26

Gnocchi alla Baba

House made potato - ricotta dumpling in a tomato - basil sauce with eggplant and mozzarella.

$26

I Rigatoni

Diced chicken, spicy sausage, rosemary, tomato- cream

$27

Ravioli Del Giorno

Homemade Special of the day

P/A

Lasagne Alla Bolognese

Fennel sausage & veal ragu.

Lasagna Bolognese $25

Linguine alle Vongole

Coclkles and little -necj clams, roasted garlic, white calm broth, herbs and EVOO

$27

Linguine Nere Alla Monsignore

Fresh black squid ink pasta with shrimp, scallops, squid, clams and mussels; marinara

$35

Capelline alla Putanesca

Angel- hair pasta in flavorful blend tomato, anchovy, garlic, capers and gaeta olives.

$24

Farafelle Pimavera

Bow- tie pasta, seasonal garden vegetables, garlic, herbs and extra virgin olive oil.

$23

Garganelli alla Trecolori

fresh egg pasta, sweet sausage, broccoli rabe, sun dried tomato, basil-pesto.

$29

PAPPARDELLE al BUON GUSTAIO

Fresh wide-ribbon pasta, peas and shiitake mushrooms in a bolognese sauce topped with shaved Pecorino cheese

$28

PICATTA a la TRECOLORI

Veal scaloppine sautèed in lemon, butter and white wine topped with roasted red pepper and capers over Linguine.

$32

SORRENTINO

Francese-Style veal cutlets topped with prosciutto, eggplant and mozzarella; tomato-demiglaçe sauce over Linguine.

$34

MARTINI

Parmesan-crusted veal cutlets, artichoke hearts and white vermouth reduction over Linguine.

$33

COSTOLETTE ALLA CAPRICCIOSA

Pounded and breaded veal chop, arugula, tomato and red onion salad; Balsamic vinaigrette.

$36
